summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9, 2019. It records inmate population counts by housing unit for an official out-count procedure. The document is significant as it originates from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held prior to his death.

events.title: Daily Prison Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate population count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: Document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet dated August 9, 2019.
Originates from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
Records inmate population counts by housing unit (B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, G-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, Z-B).
Shows a total inmate count of 758 with 4 out-counted, resulting in 754 inmates present.
Document is procedural, showing routine prison administration on a date close to Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.
